twc_daily.narrative: Thunderstorms likely early. Lows overnight in the low 70s.
Afternoon showers and thunderstorms. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Mix of sun and clouds. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the low 70s.
A few clouds. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the low 70s.

nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 8pm and 2am, then patchy fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 77. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. North wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am. Partly cloudy. Low around 75, with temperatures rising to around 77 overnight. North wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws_periods.name: Friday Night
nws_periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 73.

nws_periods.name: Saturday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 81.

nws_periods.name: Saturday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 73.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 87.

nws_periods.name: Sunday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 75.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 82.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 69.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
